### Data Science, FT 2025

This course provides a practical and theoretical introduction to the field of Data Science. Students will learn the foundations of data acquisition, processing, statistical modeling, machine learning, and data visualization. The course emphasizes hands-on experience using R/Quarto and real-world datasets to prepare students for careers in analytics and data-driven decision making
